name: 蒼葉
message: "Noiz..."

name: ノイズ
message: "It's lonely, not being able to feel."

name: ノイズ
message: "I don't know how anyone else feels. I don't know how to connect with them."

name: ノイズ
message: "I was so lonely, it hurt."

name: ノイズ
message: "But no one understood. Even my parents treated me like a parasite."

name: ノイズ
message: "I'm sure they hoped I would hurry up and die. But that's why I was determined to live."

name: ノイズ
message: "I was going to survive, even if I was all alone."

name: ノイズ
message: "The first step was to stop depending on others. I mastered the skills I needed to survive. I learned to manage on my own."

name: ノイズ
message: "No one cares if I die. No one ties me down. It's the best way to live."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You're wrong."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You know it too."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Look, I care about you. That's why I worry, why I treat your wounds when you're hurt, and why I'd be sad if you died."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Plus, you still want that rematch, right? You need me to make that happen. That's why you've stuck with me so long. Actually..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why are you so hung up on Rhyme? I thought you had no interest in people."

name: ノイズ
message: "...In Rhyme, you feel the damage in your mind, not your body. So even someone like me can feel it―the pain, that is."

name: ノイズ
message: "I'd never known pain before... but when I took damage in Rhyme, I felt I could finally understand."

name: ノイズ
message: "It was only in those moments that I really felt alive. Like I wasn't some kind of monster, some reject."

name: ノイズ
message: "Even though it hurt, I was never afraid of taking damage in Rhyme."

name: ノイズ
message: "I was good at it. I was strong even with the pain, and that reinforced the notion that I didn't need anyone else to survive."

name: ノイズ
message: "But then you beat me. I want to fight you again, and win."

name: ノイズ
message: "You're the person who intruded on my solitude."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You're contradicting yourself. Maybe you can live alone, sure. But..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But you really do want to connect with other people. That's why you devoted yourself to Rhyme."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Rhyme was the one place you could share things with people, right? Pain was just one of those things. Rhyme is how I found you, fought you, and beat you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So isn't the fact that you want a rematch with me, the person who 'intruded on your solitude,' just proof of how badly you want to connect?"

name: ノイズ
message: "That's―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, I'll give you your rematch. But it can't just be in Rhyme. It has to be in the real world too."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You aren't alone anymore, and you don't have to be. I won't let you be. And if you want to know what pain is, I'll teach you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And that's why I'm gonna destroy you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm gonna destroy the world you're hiding in... the world that's holding you captive."
